publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5953 Jackie Baillie: Citizens of the Year 2010—That the Parliament congratulates Jim Murray and Georgie Duncan on winning the Vale of Leven and Dumbarton Citizen of the Year awards respectively; understands that Jim Murray has been recognised for his role as chairman and co-founder of the Bonhill Senior Citizens Group, which has been an integral part of the local community; notes that Georgie Duncan has also been recognised for her work with senior citizens throughout Dumbarton, and praises the hard work and dedication of both Mr Murray and Mrs Duncan and all volunteers who help contribute to the local communities of Vale of Leven and Dumbarton.
S3M-5953Citizens of the Year 2010 (lodged on 15 March 2010) Hugh Henry*
S3M-5953 Citizens of the Year 2010 (lodged on 15 March 2010) Pauline McNeill*

S3M-5953 Jackie Baillie: Citizens of the Year 2010—That the Parliament congratulates Jim Murray and Georgie Duncan on winning the Vale of Leven and Dumbarton Citizen of the Year awards respectively; understands that Jim Murray has been recognised for his role as chairman and co-founder of the Bonhill Senior Citizens Group, which has been an integral part of the local community; notes that Georgie Duncan has also been recognised for her work with senior citizens throughout Dumbarton, and praises the hard work and dedication of both Mr Murray and Mrs Duncan and all volunteers who help contribute to the local communities of Vale of Leven and Dumbarton. Supported by: Mary Mulligan, Mr Frank McAveety, Bob Doris, James Kelly, Trish Godman, Sarah Boyack, Hugh Henry, Pauline McNeill, Cathy Peattie*
